section.title: Configuring &abbrev;
section.para: Once you are ready with generating CA, server and client certificates, copy them to the respective machines and configure &abbrev; to use them. In theory, the CA and other certificates could be placed anywhere in the file system. In practice, server applications, such as &abbrev; are often protected by AppArmor, SELinux or other mechanisms, therefore it is recommended to create sub-directories where the syslog-ng.conf resides. This way &abbrev; can read them without modifying the related access rules.
